headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  BLANK, ROBERT S

snippet: BLANK--Robert S. The Trustees, faculty, and staff of the University of Pennsylvania are deeply saddened by the death of our great friend and Emeritus Trustee Robert S. Blank. An alumnus of Penn Law, Bob was devoted to the University, serving for many years as an Overseer for both the Law School and the Wharton School, as well as on the Penn Medicine Board. Bob was the son of Penn graduates and was proud to continue his family legacy at Penn through his three children, all alumni. He devoted his time and expertise over many years to ensuring the University would hold inspiring promise for future generations of scholars. Together with his wife, Nancy, he endowed professorships, provided student financial aid, and generously supported the Law School and Wharton, among other areas of the University. We extend our heartfelt condolences to Nancy, their children, grandchildren, and extended family and friends. Bob's warmth and devotion will be deeply missed by the entire University community. David L. Cohen, Chairman Andrea Mitchell, Vice Chair Amy Gutmann, President Geoffrey Garrett, Dean, Wharton School J. Larry Jameson, Dean, Perelman School of Medicine Theodore Ruger, Dean, Penn Law 1/3
